thread.title: Muslim groups say MPs must demand Gaza ceasefire to campaign in mosques | Power & Politics
thread.title_full: Muslim groups say MPs must demand Gaza ceasefire to campaign in mosques | Power & Politics

title: Muslim groups say MPs must demand Gaza ceasefire to campaign in mosques | Power & Politics
text: Over 300 Muslim groups signed a letter a few weeks before Ramadan announcing that members of Parliament won’t be welcome in mosques unless they demand a ceasefire in Gaza. CEO of the National Council of Canadian Muslims Stephen Brown discusses the details of the letter. »»» Subscribe to CBC News to watch more videos: http://bit.ly/1RreYWS Connect with CBC News Online: For breaking news, video, audio and in-depth coverage: http://bit.ly/1Z0m6iX Follow CBC News on TikTok: https://bit.ly/3TnHioe Follow CBC News on Twitter: http://bit.ly/1sA5P9H Find CBC News on Facebook: http://bit.ly/1WjG36m Follow CBC News on Instagram: http://bit.ly/1Z0iE7O Subscribe to CBC News on Snapchat: https://bit.ly/3leaWsr Download the CBC News app for iOS: http://apple.co/25mpsUz Download the CBC News app for Android: http://bit.ly/1XxuozZ For more than 80 years, CBC News has been the source Canadians turn to, to keep them informed about their communities, their country and their world.
